賜う: (たまう) - (after the -masu stem of a verb)  semi-polite or endearing auxiliary verb indicating reception by the speaker

賜物: (tamamono) - gift, boon; (good) result, fruit (exemplo dos próprios esforços)

賞める: (ほめる) - to praise; to admire; to speak well

賢愚: (けんぐ) - the wise and the foolish

賢木: (さかき) - sakaki (species of evergreen sacred to Shinto, Cleyera japonica); evergreen (esp. one planted or used at a shrine)

賢者タイム: (けんじゃタイム) - (joc) period after orgasm when a man is free from sexual desire and can think clearly
賢者モード: (けんじゃモード) - (joc) period after orgasm when a man is free from sexual desire and can think clearly
賢臣: (けんしん) - wise and able retainer

賤民: (せんみん) - lowly people (esp. as a caste); humble people
